aka: Concert for the Battle of El Tala

cast.name: 加布里埃尔·奇沃伊尼克 Gabriel Chwojnik

writer.name: 马里亚诺·利纳斯 Mariano Llinás
加布里埃尔·奇沃伊尼克 Gabriel Chwojnik

director.name: 马里亚诺·利纳斯 Mariano Llinás

this_title: Concierto para la batalla de El Tala
trans_title: Concert for the Battle of El Tala
introduction: This is a film with music. Or about the music and texts that accompany, in a poetic way, a decisive battle between Unitarian and Federalists. The vicissitudes of the birth of a nation based on the play written by Mariano Llinás and Gabriel Chwojnik, whose images achieve some hypnotic strength.
foreign_title: Concierto para la batalla de El Tala
